txt.en: The creatures of the Wódfen have been driven mad by something. Corpses litter the marsh, and beasts attack without warning.\n\nYou should defeat a number of the salamanders and crebain in the marsh.
The creatures of the Wódfen have been driven mad by something. Corpses litter the marsh, and beasts attack without warning.
There are many crazed beasts in the Wódfen
Defeated salamanders and crebain in the Wódfen ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat salamanders and crebain in the Wódfen
Salamanders and crebain can be found in the Wódfen.\n\nYou should defeat many salamanders and crebain to see if you can discover the source of their madness.
Defeat salamanders and crebain in the Wódfen ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Salamanders and crebain can be found in the Wódfen.\n\nYou should defeat many salamanders and crebain to see if you can discover the source of their madness.
